languages.text: {n}Желваки дознавателя гуляют под кожей, он явно изо всех сил держит себя под контролем.{/n} ""Это" — представитель Навис Нобилите, благородного дворянского сословия мутантов, правящих пустотные суда Человечества сквозь предательский варп. А теперь, Вольный Торговец, прекратите задавать идиотские вопросы и идите договаривайтесь со своим новым навигатором".

{n}The muscles in Heinrix's jaw twitch as he struggles to maintain self-control.{/n} "'This' is one of the Navis Nobilite, the noble caste of mutants who guide Humanity's voidships through the treacherous warp. And now, Rogue Trader, stop asking stupid questions and go negotiate with your new Navigator."
languages.original_text: {n}Желваки дознавателя гуляют под кожей, он явно изо всех сил держит себя под контролем.{/n} ""Это" — представитель Навис Нобилите, благородного дворянского сословия мутантов, правящих пустотные суда Человечества сквозь предательский варп. А теперь, Вольный Торговец, прекратите задавать идиотские вопросы и идите договаривайтесь со своим новым навигатором".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gnashes his teeth, clearly struggling to maintain self-control.{/n} "'This' is one of the Navis Nobilite, a noble caste of mutants who guide Humanity's voidships through the treacherous warp. And now, Rogue Trader, stop asking stupid questions and go negotiate with your new Navigator."

{n}The muscles in Heinrix's jaw twitch as he struggles to maintain self-control.{/n} "'This' is one of the Navis Nobilite, the noble caste of mutants who guide Humanity's voidships through the treacherous warp. And now, Rogue Trader, stop asking stupid questions and go negotiate with your new Navigator."

{n}The muscles in Heinrix's jaw twitch as he struggles to maintain self-control.{/n} "'This' is one of the Navis Nobilite, the noble caste of mutants who guide Humanity's voidships through the treacherous warp. And now, Rogue Trader, stop asking stupid questions and go negotiate with your new Navigator."

languages.text: {n}Die Muskeln in Heinrix Kiefer zucken, als er versucht, nicht die Beherrschung zu verlieren.{/n} "'Das' gehört zur Navis Nobilite, einer edlen Kaste von Mutanten, die die Raumschiffe der Menschheit durch den gefährlichen Warp führen. Und jetzt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, stellt keine weiteren dummen Fragen, sondern konferiert mit Eurer neuen Navigatorin."
languages.original_text: {n}The muscles in Heinrix's jaw twitch as he struggles to maintain self-control.{/n} "'This' is one of the Navis Nobilite, the noble caste of mutants who guide Humanity's voidships through the treacherous warp. And now, Rogue Trader, stop asking stupid questions and go negotiate with your new Navigator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix knirscht mit den Zähnen und hat offensichtlich Probleme, die Selbstkontrolle zu behalten{/n} "'Das' gehört zur Navis Nobilite, einer edlen Kaste von Mutanten, die die Raumschiffe der Menschheit durch den gefährlichen Warp führen. Und jetzt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, stellt keine weiteren dummen Fragen, sondern konferiert mit Eurer neuen Navigatorin."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix serre les dents alors qu'il se fait violence pour garder son sang-froid.{/n} « Elle fait partie de la Navis Nobilite, la caste aristocratique de mutants qui guident les vaisseaux de l'humanité à travers les dangers du Warp. Et maintenant, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, cessez de poser des questions stupides et allez négocier avec votre nouvelle navigatrice. »
languages.original_text: {n}The muscles in Heinrix's jaw twitch as he struggles to maintain self-control.{/n} "'This' is one of the Navis Nobilite, the noble caste of mutants who guide Humanity's voidships through the treacherous warp. And now, Rogue Trader, stop asking stupid questions and go negotiate with your new Navigator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix serre les dents, luttant visiblement pour garder le contrôle.{/n} « C'est une membre de la Navis Nobilite, une noble caste de mutants qui guident les vaisseaux de l'humanité à travers les dangers du Warp. Et maintenant, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, cessez de poser des questions idiotes et allez négocier avec votre nouvelle navigatrice. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希绷紧了下巴上的肌肉，显然在努力保持着克制态度。{/n}“‘这玩意儿’是导航宗族的成员，是变种人之中的尊贵成员，负责引导人类虚空舰穿过邪恶的亚空间。好了，行商浪人，别再问愚蠢的问题了，去和你的新任导航者谈判吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The muscles in Heinrix's jaw twitch as he struggles to maintain self-control.{/n} "'This' is one of the Navis Nobilite, the noble caste of mutants who guide Humanity's voidships through the treacherous warp. And now, Rogue Trader, stop asking stupid questions and go negotiate with your new Navigator."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希咬紧了牙，显然在努力保持着克制态度。{/n}“‘这玩意儿’是导航宗族的成员，是变种人之中的尊贵成员，负责引导人类虚空舰穿过邪恶的亚空间。好了，行商浪人，别再问愚蠢的问题了，去和你的新任导航者谈判吧。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの顎の筋肉が痙攣している。明らかに自制を保とうとしているようだ。{/n}「こいつは航宙貴族、人類のヴォイドシップを危険な<歪み>に誘導した、高貴な階級の一人だ。さあ、自由開拓者、バカな質問はやめて新しい航宙士との交渉に入ってくれよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The muscles in Heinrix's jaw twitch as he struggles to maintain self-control.{/n} "'This' is one of the Navis Nobilite, the noble caste of mutants who guide Humanity's voidships through the treacherous warp. And now, Rogue Trader, stop asking stupid questions and go negotiate with your new Navigator."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの顎の筋肉が痙攣している。明らかに自制を保とうとしているようだ。{/n}「こいつは航宙貴族、人類のヴォイドシップを危険な<歪み>に誘導した、高貴な階級の一人だ。さあ、自由開拓者、バカな質問はやめて新しい航宙士との交渉に入ってくれよ」

languages.text: {n}La mandíbula de Heinrix se tensa e intenta mantener el control.{/n} «"Esto" pertenece a la Navis Nobilite, una casta noble de mutantes que guía las naves del vacío de la Humanidad por la peligrosa disformidad. Y ahora, Comerciante Independiente, deje de hacer preguntas estúpidas y negocie con su nueva navegante».
languages.original_text: {n}The muscles in Heinrix's jaw twitch as he struggles to maintain self-control.{/n} "'This' is one of the Navis Nobilite, the noble caste of mutants who guide Humanity's voidships through the treacherous warp. And now, Rogue Trader, stop asking stupid questions and go negotiate with your new Navigator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix rechina los dientes, mostrándose visiblemente inquieto.{/n} «"Esto" pertenece a la Navis Nobilite, una casta noble de mutantes que guía las naves del vacío de la Humanidad por la peligrosa disformidad. Y ahora, Comerciante Independiente, deje de hacer preguntas estúpidas y negocie con su nueva navegante».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in çenesindeki kaslar seğirirken, kendini kontrol etmekte zorlanıyor.{/n} "'Bu', Navis Nobilite'nin, yani İnsanlığın uçsuz gemilerini öteboyutun güvenilmezliğinde yönlendiren soylu sınıfa mensup bir mutant. Hür Tacir, artık aptalca sorular sormayı bırak da gidip yeni Rotacı'n ile görüş."
languages.original_text: {n}The muscles in Heinrix's jaw twitch as he struggles to maintain self-control.{/n} "'This' is one of the Navis Nobilite, the noble caste of mutants who guide Humanity's voidships through the treacherous warp. And now, Rogue Trader, stop asking stupid questions and go negotiate with your new Navigator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in çenesindeki kaslar seğirirken, kendini kontrol etmekte zorlanıyor.{/n} "'Bu', Navis Nobilite'nin, yani İnsanlığın uçsuz gemilerini öteboyutun güvenilmezliğinde yönlendiren soylu sınıfa mensup bir mutant. Hür Tacir, artık aptalca sorular sormayı bırak da gidip yeni Rotacı'n ile görüş."
